name: Get Down! (camdeno, GMEubanks, tessahardin, Matlow100, euskoog, picross)
name_original: Get Down! (camdeno, GMEubanks, tessahardin, Matlow100, euskoog, picross)
description:
Get deeper in the party dungeon and deeper into chaos!

You are Vinyl Throwman, a disco exterminator - contracted to slay any boogie monsters that take over empty clubs, hangouts, and disco dance floors! This party dungeon is a hole in the ground comprised of ten floors - with more zany boogie monsters dwelling at the deepest depths. Can you use your ability to throw records to slice up all the fiends? 

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam, with the theme "deeper and deeper".

     

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement

Mouse: Aim record crosshair

Left Mouse Button: Throw Record

Right Mouse Button: Catch Record

Spacebar/Left Shift: Dash

R: Restart level


Meet the Boogie Monsters!

The stationary jammers: these little dudes are vibing where they shouldn't be!

The chasers: they will chase down anyone to the ends of the earth if their party time is disrupted!

The spitters: these fools will hock a loogie at anyone they think will commit a party foul!

The Big Bad Deep Dish Beatza: There's deep, there's deeper, and then there's deep dish pizza... brought into sentience out of pure party energy, he will stop at nothing to make deep dish pizza reign supreme!

OST:

euskoog · Get Down OST

Team

Jaden Goter: programming lead

Tessa Hardin: art

Camden Obertop: art

Matt Lowe: level design

Erik Skoog: OST, sound design

Gabe Eubanks: sound design
